SELECT u.user_id, u.username, ui.truename,ui.attribute, od3.`name` as regionName, od2.`name` as branchName, od.`name` as departmentName FROM ht_users u LEFT JOIN ht_users_info ui ON u.user_id= ui.user_id INNER JOIN ht_crm.oa_users ou ON u.user_id= ou.hyd_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E', 'Q1', 'Q11', 'Q2', 'Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_crm.oa_department od ON od.id = ou.departmentid LEFT JOIN ht_crm.oa_department od2 ON od2.id = od.parentid LEFT JOIN ht_crm.oa_department od3 on od3.id = od2.parentid WHERE 1=1
AND u.username= #{employeeName}

SELECT `t`.user_id AS user_id, t.username AS username, `od3`.`id` AS `regionId`, `od3`.`name` AS `regionName`, `od2`.`id` AS `branchId`, `od2`.`name` AS `branchName`, `od`.`id` AS `departmentId`, `od`.`name` AS `departmentName` FROM ( SELECT u.user_id, u.username, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN u.user_id ELSE su.spreads_userid END AS hyd_id FROM ht_users u LEFT JOIN ht_users_info ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_spreads_users su ON u.user_id = su.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ) t LEFT JOIN `ht_crm`.`oa_users` `ou` ON `ou`.`hyd_id` = `t`.`hyd_id` AND ou.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN `ht_crm`.`oa_department` `od` ON `od`.`id` = `ou`.`departmentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_crm`.`oa_department` `od2` ON `od2`.`id` = `od`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN `ht_crm`.`oa_department` `od3` ON `od3`.`id` = `od2`.`parentid` WHERE `od`.id IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, parentid, name, description, ishead, ishr, isfinance, cuttype, provinceid, cityid, header, manager, position_category, listorder FROM ht_crm.oa_department
SELECT COUNT(hup.user_id) FROM ht_users_portrait hup LEFT JOIN ht_users hydur ON hydur.user_id = hup.user_id
SELECT u.user_id, c.sign, c.alias, c.package_code, c.client, u.mobile FROM ht_user u INNER JOIN ht_user_alias c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} limit 1
